title: syllabify
text:
syllabify





Name
Description




syllabify_tg
Syllabify an entire AlignedTextGrid


syllabify_word
Syllabify a single word





syllabify.syllabify_tg(tg)
Syllabify an entire AlignedTextGrid Args: tg (AlignedTextGrid): The textgrid to syllabify



syllabify.syllabify_word(word)
Syllabify a single word











Name
Type
Description
Default




word
aligned_textgrid.SequenceInterval
The word Sequence Interval to syllabify
required

title: Fave Syllabify
text: This is a work in progress.

title: Fave Syllabify
text:
Usage

from aligned_textgrid import AlignedTextGrid, custom_classes
from fave_syllabify.syllabify import syllabify_tg


tg = AlignedTextGrid(
    textgrid_path = "data/josef-fruehwald_speaker.TextGrid",
    entry_classes = custom_classes(["Word", "Phone"])
)

tg

AlignedTextGrid with 1 groups named ['group_0'] each with [2] tiers. [['Word', 'Phone']]



syllabify_tg(tg)

tg

AlignedTextGrid with 1 groups named ['group_0'] each with [4] tiers. [['Word', 'Syllable', 'SylPart', 'Phone']]



beyond = [
    w 
    for w in tg.group_0.Word 
    if w.label == "beyond"
    ][0]


beyond.sub_labels

['syl-2', 'syl-1']



beyond.last.sub_labels

['nucleus', 'coda']



beyond.last.last.sub_labels

['N', 'D']
